segments.text: My attention is drawn to the children on the left side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet where a "COOKIE JAR" sits.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little hand is already in there, grasping for something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands below him, looking up with such eager anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand raised, ready to receive her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a sneaky operation they've got going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're clearly trying to get cookies without the adult knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork is actually rather impressive, if a bit naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught mid-raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential sugar rush is almost palpable from here.
segments.speaker: PAR
